snippet: The iPhone 5 has a new connector on the phone’s base that instantly renders all accessories and chargers obsolete. An adapter that will work with many, but not all, current accessories starts at $30.
abstract: Apple's new iPhone 5 has a new connector on phone’s base, called the Lightning port, that instantly renders all accessories and chargers obsolete; adapter that will work with many, but not all, current accessories starts at $30; connector could be a boon to the hundreds of companies that sell accessories for iPhones and iPads.
lead_paragraph: The iPhone 5 has a new connector on the phone’s base that instantly renders all accessories and chargers obsolete. An adapter that will work with many, but not all, current accessories starts at $30.

headline.seo: Iphone 5 Design Thrills Partners, but Will Cost Users
headline.main: Design Thrills Apple’s Partners, but Will Cost Users
headline.print_headline: Design Thrills Apple’s Partners, but Will Cost Users
